      • RedEnemy

        public RedEnemy(java.util.Map<Direction,java.util.ArrayList<processing.core.PImage>> frames,
                int x,
                int y)
        Constructs a new RedEnemy. This includes initialising the list of random directions used in the autoMove method.
        Parameters:
        frames - A map of the RedEnemy's animation frames.
        x - The initial x-coord of the enemy.
        y - The initial y-coord of the enemy.
